docs.snippet: Goals by Edinson Cavani and Christian Stuani lifted Uruguay past Slovenia 2-0 in a World Cup warm-up game Wednesday night.
docs.lead_paragraph: Goals by Edinson Cavani and Christian Stuani lifted Uruguay past Slovenia 2-0 in a World Cup warm-up game Wednesday night.

docs.snippet: The U.S.’s tough group was just one of the hotly debated outcomes of the draw in December. Relying more on world rankings would lead to more balanced groups.

headline.main: The World Cup Draw Is Unfair. Here’s a Better Way.

docs.snippet: Striker Edinson Cavani and substitute Christian Stuani scored to fire Uruguay to a 2-0 win over Slovenia in their final World Cup warmup at the Centenario on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Striker Edinson Cavani and substitute Christian Stuani scored to fire Uruguay to a 2-0 win over Slovenia in their final World Cup warmup at the Centenario on Wednesday.

headline.main: Uruguay Beat Slovenia 2-0 in Last World Cup Warmup

docs.snippet: An experimental England side gave a decent performance in a 2-2 draw with Ecuador who equalised through a superb strike by substitute Michael Arroyo before both sides were reduced to 10 men in an incident-packed World Cup warmup match on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: An experimental England side gave a decent performance in a 2-2 draw with Ecuador who equalised through a superb strike by substitute Michael Arroyo before both sides were reduced to 10 men in an incident-packed World Cup warmup match on Wednesday.

headline.main: Two Sent Off as England Held by Battling Ecuador
headline.print_headline: Two Sent Off as England Held by Battling Ecuador

docs.snippet: Defending World Cup champion Spain will travel to Brazil as the No. 1 team in the FIFA rankings, and the host nation will kick off as No. 3.

headline.main: Spain Heads FIFA Rankings, Brazil Rises to No. 3

docs.snippet: Former Italy coach Marcello Lippi believes the country should pay no attention to the embarrassing 1-1 draw with Luxembourg, saying that friendly matches "don't count".
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Italy coach Marcello Lippi believes the country should pay no attention to the embarrassing 1-1 draw with Luxembourg, saying that friendly matches "don't count".

headline.main: Friendlies Don't Count, Says Lippi After Luxembourg Draw
headline.print_headline: Friendlies Don't Count, Says Lippi After Luxembourg Draw

docs.snippet: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain's place in England's World Cup squad looked in jeopardy on Thursday after it was confirmed the Arsenal winger had injured medial knee ligaments in the friendly against Ecuador the previous day.
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain's place in England's World Cup squad looked in jeopardy on Thursday after it was confirmed the Arsenal winger had injured medial knee ligaments in the friendly against Ecuador the previous day.

docs.snippet: One of the most telling moments of England's World Cup build-up came off the pitch, away from the players, crowds and live TV cameras on the night of a laboured 1-0 win over Denmark at Wembley in March.

docs.snippet: Today's Brazil is a completely different country from the one that last hosted the World Cup in 1950 but some things have hardly changed even after 64 years.
